doc.title: Notes from the Space Time Continuum
doc.plot: A young man awakes to a world that thrives on erasing all traces of individuality and personal freedom. Day after day he trudges along in this mundane existence, executing his routine, encountering characters whose single-track thinking is reflected in their outward appearance. Until a clash with the Boss, forces him to decide to stand up for his freedom and individuality or to simply give in.
